import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.e13e7e28:
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10,7))
sns.countplot(data=df,x='Stream', order = df['Stream'].value_counts().index,palette='rocket')
plt.xticks(rotation=70)
plt.show()
source.81c22604:
plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
classx = ['Placed','Not placed']
plt.title('Placed percentage')
colors = sns.color_palette("hls", 8)[6:8]
countx = [len(df[df.PlacedOrNot == 1]),len(df[df.PlacedOrNot == 0])]
plt.pie(countx, labels = classx,colors=colors,autopct='%1.2f%%')
plt.show()

source.3080959a:
plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
classx = ['Placed','Not placed']
plt.title('Placements < 2 internships')
colors = sns.color_palette("hls", 8)[4:8]
df2 = df[df.Internships < 2]
countx = [len(df2[df2.PlacedOrNot == 1]),len(df2[df2.PlacedOrNot == 0])]
plt.pie(countx, labels = classx,colors=colors,autopct='%1.2f%%')
plt.show()
source.c6576e4d:
plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
classx = ['Placed','Not placed']
plt.title('Placements > 2 internships')
colors = sns.color_palette("hls", 8)[6:8]
df2 = df[df.Internships >= 2]
countx = [len(df2[df2.PlacedOrNot == 1]),len(df2[df2.PlacedOrNot == 0])]
plt.pie(countx, labels = classx,colors=colors,autopct='%1.2f%%')
plt.show()
source.3129bdaa:
dfx = df[df.Gender == 'Female']
for i in df.Stream.unique():
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    classx = ['Placed','Not placed']
    plt.title(i)
    dfxx = dfx[dfx.Stream == i]
    countx = [len(dfxx[dfxx.PlacedOrNot == 1]),len(dfxx[dfxx.PlacedOrNot == 0])]
    plt.pie(countx, labels = classx,colors=colors,autopct='%1.2f%%')
    plt.show()
source.6ec1e0d0:
dfx = df[df.Gender == 'Male']
for i in df.Stream.unique():
    plt.figure(figsize=(6, 6))
    classx = ['Placed','Not placed']
    plt.title(i)
    dfxx = dfx[dfx.Stream == i]
    countx = [len(dfxx[dfxx.PlacedOrNot == 1]),len(dfxx[dfxx.PlacedOrNot == 0])]
    plt.pie(countx, labels = classx,colors=colors,autopct='%1.2f%%')
    plt.show()

import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import cross_val_score
source.1b79781f:
from sklearn.tree import DecisionTreeClassifier
dtc = DecisionTreeClassifier()
scores = cross_val_score(dtc, X, y, cv=5, scoring='accuracy')
np.mean(scores)
source.9c70e26b:
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
rfc = RandomForestClassifier()
scores = cross_val_score(rfc, X, y, cv=5, scoring='accuracy')
np.mean(scores)
source.aa5c2390:
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier

np.mean(scores)

knn = KNeighborsClassifier()

np.mean(scores)
